#using function to find volume for range of fractions and area = 182
```{r}
fraction_range <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)


volume_182 <- predict_runoff(fraction_range, 182)

```

bind seq of fractions with runoff volumes

